Container.Name: nzbget-ng
Container.Overview:
NZBGet is a binary downloader, which downloads files from Usenet based on information provided by nzb-files.
NZBGet is written in C++ and is known for its performance and efficiency.
NZBGet can run on almost any device - classic PC, NAS, media player, SAT-receiver, WLAN-router, etc.
The download area provides precompiled binaries for Windows, macOS, Linux (compatible with many CPUs and platform variants), FreeBSD and Android. For other platforms the program can be compiled from sources.
This is a summary. For full documentation, please visit the NZBGet-NG home page at: http://nzbget-ng.github.io
